text: Ne (khwabahelesia eshinyasio) khulwo okhufunaka khwabu indakano nende okhukhaya khwabu abimanyisio bia Nyasaye nende okhwira khwabu Abarumwa khunjila ilali yatoto, nende okhuboola khwabu mbu; â€œ Emioyo chiefu chekalwa, ne shichekalwa tawe, halali Nyasaye yachiupakhwo eshimanyisio khulwa obukhayi bwabu, kho shibasuubilanga halali hatiti butswa
